backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a background-darkening CSS overlay change affecting index.css.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH design tokens and dark-mode variants for global theme styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling all site sections with theme application on mount.
frontend/src/components/common/GlassCard: Reusable glass-style card wrapper with optional hover and neon hover effects.
frontend/src/components/common/NeonButto: Configurable neon-themed button component with variants, sizes, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/contact/useConta: Custom hook managing contact form state, validation, submission simulation, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SectionSh: Section wrapper providing spacing, container layout, and optional glass styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with social links, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Fixed header with navigation, scroll behavior, theme toggle, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/portfo: Defines the PortfolioItem type and provides grouped sample portfolio entries with thumbnails and embedded video metadata.
Provides media type definitions and helpers, including video source handling and URL normalization for embed formats.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Modal dialog displaying video or image previews with close controls, ESC handling, and backdrop behavior.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with an image, biography text, and a tools grid inside styled layout components.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements the contact form UI with validation, submission states, and a success message using custom hooks and styled components.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero banner with title, description, CTA buttons, and animated background decorations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Shows portfolio categories and items with thumbnails, video indicators, and a preview dialog triggered on selection.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists service offerings with icons and descriptions inside styled glass cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Presents client testimonials in a three-column grid using glass card styling.
frontend/src/components/visual/Backgroun: Adds floating decorative bubble elements positioned in the background with animation effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous actor via react-query and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToSection.ts: Offers a helper to smoothly scroll to a DOM element by ID with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages dark/light theme state synced to localStorage and applies the corresponding class to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, global backgrounds, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versions, existing features, and pending feature requests.
